abstract: Paul Goldschmidt, a first baseman called up from the minors, delivers the biggest hit of the game in the Arizona Diamondbacks' 8-1, victory over the Milwaukee Brewers in Game 3 of the National League division series.
snippet: Paul Goldschmidt, a first baseman called up Aug. 1, delivered the biggest hit of the game for Arizona on Tuesday night.
lead_paragraph: Paul Goldschmidt, a first baseman called up Aug. 1, delivered the biggest hit of the game for Arizona on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Brewers Test Arizona’s Rookie Slugger, and He Passes
headline.print_headline: Brewers Test Arizona’s Rookie Slugger, and He Passes
headline.seo: Arizona’s Rookie Slugger Sows Confusion in Brewers
